hanzi-su-wiki:
撃

Значения

Нападать; стрелять, бить, наносить удар; забивать

Мнемоника

Забивать 殳 рукой 扌 чеку в ось телеги 車.

Варианты

擊, 击
purpleculture_pinyin:
jī
Japanese variant of 击
Японский вариант хита
rtega_mnemonic:
擊擊RS
击击		撃strike, hit, beat, attack, fight
  • jostling 毄/𣪠 of the hand 手
  • modf. 擊 → 撃
  • ⓢ heavy club → 击
heisig_constituent: beat, tank, car, cruise missile, missile, wind, crotch, hand
koohiiStory1: Your car has missles?! That beats mine, hands down.
koohiiStory2: Think 3 methods of attack all combined into 1 kanji: 1. Vehicle to transport troops 2. Once troops have disembarked they have their missiles 3. If they run out of missiles they resort to hand to hand combat to beat the enemy.
jp_example_words:
襲撃(しゅうげき): attack, charge, raid
衝撃(しょうげき): shock, crash, impact, ballistic
打撃(だげき): blow, shock, strike, damage, batting (baseball)
反撃(はんげき): counterattack, counteroffensive, counterblow
撃つ(うつ): attack, defeat, destroy
攻撃(こうげき): attack, strike, offensive, criticism, censure
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: If someone is coming toward you in a car, holding a weapon in their hand, they're going to attack you!
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture the car, weapon out the window, preparing to attack you full force!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Right before the attack begins, you recognize the hand holding this weapon and driving this car. It's Gecki (げき), your long-lost gecko who you may or may not have let fly off into a really fierce tsunami. Oops. I think he may be here attacking you out of revenge.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Gecki is attacking you now. He's hitting you over and over with his tiny car. He's yelling and smacking your ankles with his weapon. And all you can do is wait and let the attack happen, because you know you deserve it.
Ru_Notes: Не путать: 摯 (シ искренность, серьёзность)
Ru_Words:
撃つうつ
  • стрелять
  • нападать
    • 攻撃こうげき
  • атака, нападение, наступление, приступ
  • нападки, критика
    • 打撃だげき
  • удар (прям. и перен.)
    • 衝撃しょうげき
  • удар, столкновение
    • JR-EDICT
    爆撃ばくげき
  • [воздушная] бомбардировка
    • warodai
    反撃はんげき
  • контратака, контрудар, ответный удар
Ru_Radicals: 几 (стол), 又 (опять), 手 (рука), 殳 (удар), 車 (автомобиль)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the hand (手) under the car and the lance shaft (軗) trounces them

擊擊RS
击击 		撃 strike, hit, beat, attack, fight
  • jostling 毄/𣪠 of the hand 手
  • modf. 擊 → 撃
  • ⓢ heavy club → 击
Chinese Definition:
①用本义。敲击，敲打。［例］欲以击柱。——《史记·廉颇蔺相如列传》。
②不肯击缻。［例］留击柝者。——《资治通鉴·唐纪》。
③使击柝如故。［例］援玉枹兮击鸣鼓。——《楚辞·九歌·国殇》。［合］击壤(相传尧时有老人击壤而歌曰：“日出而作，日入而息，凿井而饮，耕田而食，率力于我何有哉？后因以比喻太平盛世)；击节(打拍子)；击鞠(击皮球)。
④攻击；攻打。［例］而诸侯敢救者，已拔赵，必移兵击之。——《史记·魏公子列传》。［合］击排(攻击排斥)；击排冒没(攻击排斥，轻率而不顾一切)；击床(击杀于床上)。
⑤碰撞；接触。［例］齐吴傍以击汰。——《楚辞·屈原·涉江》。［合］击毂摩肩(车碰轮，人摩肩。比喻拥挤，热闹)；击冲(撞击)；撞击(运动体与别的物体猛然碰上)。
⑥杀；搏杀。［例］入水击蛟。——《世说新语·自新》。［例］数击杀响马贼。——明·魏禧《大铁椎传》。
⑦客奋椎左右击。［例］猱进鸷击。——清·徐珂《清稗类钞·战事类》。［合］击斩(斩杀)；击鲜(宰杀活的牲畜禽鱼，充作美食)。

jī
яп. вм. 击
Radicals: 車, 殳, 手  (car, weapon, hand)
Meaning Mnemonic
If someone is coming toward you in a car, holding a weapon in their hand, they're going to attack you!
Picture the car, weapon out the window, preparing to attack you full force!
Reading Mnemonic
Right before the attack begins, you recognize the hand holding this weapon and driving this car. It's Gecki (げき), your long-lost gecko who you may or may not have let fly off into a really fierce tsunami. Oops. I think he may be here attacking you out of revenge.
Gecki is attacking you now. He's hitting you over and over with his tiny car. He's yelling and smacking your ankles with his weapon. And all you can do is wait and let the attack happen, because you know you deserve it.
